Reviews.Title: “Would not advice anyone to go to any of the NH Hotels”

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights single bed tight am backpacking oriented didnt feel luxury 4 stars hotel troubles reservation happen via email call 3 times call 20 minutes payment via bank transfer discover didnt receive payment payment 5th checked 15th checked checked nh schiller discovered havent received money checking payment issue reception lady told havent received money money credit card suddenly receptionist heard told troubles finance department received money account due mistake spent trip thinking worried hell am gonna payment issue due horrible bank transfer system horrible hotel 4 stars hotel rate 3 maybe bit expensive worth value admit historic beautiful thats free wifi wouldnt advice nh doelen nor nh schiller location actually plenty hotels location
